entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:08 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 2:08 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 3.
